definition: Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]

sentences.english: The peeled eggs are completely natural and provide customers with convenience and ease of use.
sentences.chinese: 白煮採用提桶或真空包裝，給用戶提供方便和快捷。

sentences.english: This Button Hook makes dressing with one hand easier and quicker.
sentences.chinese: 這使得巴頓胡克敷料用一隻手更加容易和快捷。

sentences.english: See here for some useful RTM keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一些有用的RTM快捷鍵。

sentences.english: Our company always values its customers’ satisfaction in taking care of every quality requirement and providing best speeding services in reasonable prices.
sentences.chinese: 本公司顧客至上，質量超卓，效率快捷，取價公道。

sentences.english: Do you know about other interesting shortcuts which I may have missed ?
sentences.chinese: 你還知道另外一些有趣的我可能漏掉的快捷鍵嗎？

sentences.english: The swap file is used to quickly and easily swap tiles out to disk and back in.
sentences.chinese: 交換文件使得以平鋪方式換出換入磁盤非常方便快捷。

sentences.english: This CDL tool is very easy to assemble and operate.
sentences.chinese: CDL測井儀打撈工具現場組裝快捷，操作方便。

sentences.english: Organize all your files into easy-access file trees.
sentences.chinese: 將你的各種文件排列進一棵快捷文件樹裏。

sentences.english: You will be able to swap hotbar configurations at the same time you swap specs.
sentences.chinese: 切換天賦時，可以同時切換快捷欄設置。

sentences.english: No other printers can offer such fast service.
sentences.chinese: 沒有別家可提供如此快捷的服務。

sentences.english: You can drop and drag the shortcut to other locations.
sentences.chinese: 你可以下拉並拖動創建的快捷方式到其他地方。

sentences.english: Let not nemesis catch me by the swift ships.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓報應女神娜美西斯用快捷的船艦捉拿我。

sentences.english: The Quickest Way to Get is to Give by Carina MacInnes It's true.
sentences.chinese: 最快捷的方法，更是給了隆突麥克因斯它的真實。

sentences.english: Jingang guardrails adopt the solderless combined type of design which can be installed quickly and easily.
sentences.chinese: 金鋼護欄採用無焊組裝式的設計，安裝快捷簡單。

sentences.english: Shares of software used human design, simple and quick operation.
sentences.chinese: 股票軟件採用人性化設計，操作簡單快捷。

sentences.english: This new system gives users readier access to the data.
sentences.chinese: 這個新系統可以使用戶們更快捷地進入數據庫。

definition: convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself
to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
many and complicated/mired in minor details
to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
